definitions.example: This painting shows little organization at first glance, but little by little the structure becomes clear.

definitions.definition: The way in which something is organized, such as a book or an article.
definitions.example: The organization of the book is as follows.

definitions.definition: A group of people or other legal entities with an explicit purpose and written rules.
definitions.example: In response to the crisis, the nations in the region formed an organization.   If you want to be part of this organization, you have to follow its rules.

definitions.definition: A group of people consciously cooperating.
definitions.example: Over time, the spontaneous movement had become an organization.

definitions.definition: A major league club and all its farm teams.
definitions.example: He's been in the Dodgers' organization since 2003.
